column5: The address is 3156 SH 173 N, Devine, TX 78016. It can also be located by searching for Everfree Shire Ranch on Maps.  Everfree Shire Ranch is an 11 acre estate offering accommodations for regular Air BnB visitors as well as those who need wide open country spaces.
column8: Room 2 Queen Bed @ 11 acre Horse Friendly Ranch
